name: BTS Risk Analysis App
description: Identifies potential threats such as technical failures, cyber attacks, physical damage, regulatory changes, and environmental impacts, and develops strategies to mitigate these risks to ensure reliable and secure network operations.

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

BTS Risk Analysis

Overview

This app is designed to evaluate and analyze deployment risks of Base Transceiver Stations (BTS) across the USA. It enables telecom decision-makers to assess site viability through analytical modeling, visual dashboards, and predictive analysis for effective BTS deployment planning.

Input

Users provide:

  • + City where the targeted BTS stations are located
  • + Desired BTS risk indicators such as Internal Audit Score, External Audit Score, Financial Score, Loss Score
  • + Validation dataset (see schema below) to run model prediction on
  • + Input features to train the risk prediction model on

Output

The app delivers:

  • + Visualization of number of BTS installations per location
  • + Highlighted regions with high-risk deployments
  • + Insight into how various features affect BTS deployment risk
  • + Model performance metrics after training
  • + Predictive analysis results and downloadable reports

Benefits

  • + By identifying potential risks early, the app helps avoid costly reworks and delays.
  • + Provides data-driven insights for more effective and efficient BTS deployment strategies.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html2", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Data Description

Field Name Description
City The name of the city where the telecom service is being evaluated. This helps in regional analysis and identifying location-specific risks.
Location_Score A numerical score representing the overall risk assessment of the location. Higher scores may indicate higher risk or vulnerability.
Internal_Audit_Score A score derived from internal audits, reflecting the compliance and operational health of the telecom infrastructure in the location.
External_Audit_Score A score derived from external audits, providing an independent assessment of the telecom infrastructure's compliance and performance.
Fin_Score A financial risk score, indicating the financial stability or vulnerability of the telecom operations in the location.
Loss_score A score representing the potential or actual loss associated with the telecom operations in the location, possibly due to outages, fraud, or other issues.
Past_Results A historical performance score, reflecting past incidents or performance metrics of the telecom operations in the location.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html1", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "Columns", "columns": [ { "components": [], "width": 6, "offset": 0, "push": 0, "pull": 0, "size": "md", "currentWidth": 6 }, { "components": [ { "label": "Next", "action": "event", "showValidations": false, "theme": "info", "customClass": "float-right rounded", "tableView": false, "key": "next", "type": "button", "event": "next", "input": true } ], "width": 6, "offset": 0, "push": 0, "pull": 0, "size": "md", "currentWidth": 6 } ], "key": "columns", "type": "columns", "input": false, "tableView": false } ] }
